initialize.title: Initialize Auto Claude
initialize.description: This project doesn't have Auto Claude initialized. Would you like to set it up now?
initialize.createFolder: Create a .auto-claude folder in your project
initialize.copyFramework: Copy the Auto Claude framework files
initialize.setupSpecs: Set up the specs directory for your tasks
initialize.sourcePathNotConfiguredDescription: Please set the Auto Claude source path in App Settings before initializing.
initialize.initFailedDescription: Failed to initialize Auto Claude. Please try again.

gitSetup.title: Git Repository Required
gitSetup.description: Auto Claude uses git to safely build features in isolated workspaces
gitSetup.notGitRepo: This folder is not a git repository
gitSetup.needsInit: Git needs to be initialized before Auto Claude can manage your code.
gitSetup.needsCommit: At least one commit is required for Auto Claude to create worktrees.
gitSetup.willSetup: We'll set up git for you:
gitSetup.createCommit: Create an initial commit with your current files
gitSetup.manualInstructions: Open a terminal in your project folder and run:
gitSetup.initializingRepo: Initializing git repository and creating initial commit...
gitSetup.readyToUse: Your project is now ready to use with Auto Claude!

githubSetup.connectDescription: Auto Claude requires GitHub to manage your code branches and keep tasks up to date.
githubSetup.claudeDescription: Auto Claude uses Claude AI for intelligent features like Roadmap generation, Task automation, and Ideation.
githubSetup.confirmRepoDescription: We detected a GitHub repository for this project. Please confirm or change it.
githubSetup.needsRepoDescription: Your project needs a GitHub repository. Create a new one or link to an existing repository.
githubSetup.createNewRepoDescription: Create a new repository on GitHub
githubSetup.selectAccountOrOrg: Select your personal account or an organization
githubSetup.repoPathHelp: Enter the full repository path (e.g., octocat/hello-world)
githubSetup.repoDescription: Auto Claude will use this repository for managing task branches and keeping your code up to date.
githubSetup.branchDescription: Choose which branch Auto Claude should use as the base for creating task branches.
githubSetup.branchHelp: All tasks will be created from branches like
githubSetup.branchExplanation: Auto Claude creates isolated workspaces for each task. Selecting the right base branch ensures your tasks start with the latest code from your main development line.
githubSetup.ready: Auto Claude is ready to use! You can now create tasks that will be automatically based on the {{branchName}} branch.

worktrees.title: Worktrees
worktrees.description: Manage isolated workspaces for your Auto Claude tasks
worktrees.selectProject: Select a project to view worktrees
worktrees.emptyDescription: Worktrees are created automatically when Auto Claude builds features. They provide isolated workspaces for each task.
worktrees.mergeDescription: Merge changes from this worktree into the base branch.
worktrees.deleteDescription: This will permanently delete the worktree and all uncommitted changes.

appUpdate.title: App Update Available
appUpdate.description: A new version of Auto Claude is ready to download
appUpdate.downloadSuccess: Update downloaded successfully! Click Install to restart and apply the update.

addFeature.title: Add Feature
addFeature.description: Add a new feature to your roadmap. Provide details about what you want to build and how it fits into your product strategy.
addFeature.featureTitlePlaceholder: e.g., User Authentication, Dark Mode Support
addFeature.featureDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe what this feature does and why it's valuable to users.
addFeature.rationalePlaceholder: Explain why this feature should be built and how it fits the product vision.
addFeature.failedToAdd: Failed to add feature. Please try again.

addProject.title: Add Project
addProject.description: Choose how you'd like to add a project
addProject.openExistingDescription: Browse to an existing project on your computer
addProject.createNewDescription: Start fresh with a new project folder
addProject.createNewSubtitle: Set up a new project folder
addProject.projectNameHelp: This will be the folder name. Use lowercase with hyphens.

customModel.title: Custom Model Configuration
customModel.description: Configure the model and thinking level for this chat session.

confirmations.deleteWorktreeDescription: This will permanently delete the worktree and any uncommitted changes. This action cannot be undone.

worktrees.mergeDescription: Merge changes from this worktree into the base branch.
